A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought it was great. The fanboys bashing it are just doing what they do these days - crapping all over anything that doesn't meet the strict vision in their head for someone else's creative work. Is it the best Star Wars? No. Is it an entertaining\, new take on the story that expands it rather than retreading it? Yes. Last time around\, these fanboys complained that they just remade Episode IV. This time they do something new and break new ground\, and they're furious that it doesn't mirror some youtube video's theory of who someone's parents were.
